title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: While FiveThirtyEight expressed ... In April 2018, it was announced that FiveThirtyEight would be transferred to ABC News from ESPN, Inc., majority owned by The Walt Disney Company....

title: Welcome to the new 538 website - ABC News
snippet: 18, 538 content will be published at a new vertical on the ABC News website, www.abcnews.com/538, where we will be focusing on coverage of elections, politics and American society. This means we will no longer be posting articles on our old website, www.fivethirtyeight.com.

title: Publishers Daily: ABC News Buys 'FiveThirtyEight'
snippet: The new ownership means FiveThirtyEight will expand its political coverage under ABC News. ABC News and ESPN Inc. are both divisions of The Walt Disney Company.

title: ABC News Takes Over Nate Silver’s FiveThirtyEight
snippet: But the news outlet will go back to square one at ABC News. In an unusual transfer of corporate assets, Walt Disney’s ABC News said it would acquire Silver’s much-scrutinized operation from sibling ESPN.

title: Why did ABC News acquire FiveThirtyEight? - Quora
snippet: Answer (1 of 2): Short answer: Because ESPN needed to sell FiveThirtyEight, and no one outside the Disney umbrella was willing to pay a high enough price. ESPN had been looking at divesting itself of Nate Silver’s brand for at least a few months now. TheBigLead (a sister publication to USA Toda...
